featured.text: However, I didn’t want to ___(37)__ a disturbance, so I sat down and prepared to obey the rule.
The soldier was put on trial for to obey his commanding officer’s order.

definition.zh_def: 遵從，服從（命令、法律或規則）
definition.en_def: To follow the commands, rules, or laws of someone or something.
definition.example: Children are expected to obey their parents.
